projects.title: Arabic (CODA) Spelling Correction and Dialect ID
projects.description: Working on a project with Camel Lab at new York University to generate a multi-task model that takes in a sentence and outputs the correct dialectal spelling and dialect of the sentence provided.

projects.title: Draw the word
projects.description: Drawing game. Using a docker image, we created a game that uses a portion of the data from thw quickdraw dataset, to test if a person will draw what word comes up correctly.

projects.title: Feeding Nemo
projects.description: This is a Game Created Using P5js python library. This game is inspied by the game Feeding Frenzy. The game is a simple game where you control a fish and try to eat as many fish as you can without getting eaten by the bigger fish.

projects.title: SWE Prototyping
projects.description: We collected data from a startup in new york, and worked on a prototype to expand their business by creating an app that helps them stay in touch with their users after purchase. The startup, previously "Rise New York", now "Solstice", is a company that sells caffeine vapes as nicotine replacments. Their Website

projects.title: Metric Calculator
projects.description: We created a python package that converts age(day,second, and etc...), time-zones, number systems and distance measures.

projects.title: Love is the Universal Language
projects.description: With a journey through love, poetry and a century old small pottery bowl, a first of its kind, we take a user love story and get a morse code, secret, animation. A love story to share where the latin text is forever deleted, and the morse code is forever remembered.
